opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

attorneys: Esther B. Sylvester and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Harley, Appellant.
Submitted November 9, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien, Robeets and Pomeeoy, JJ.
Morton B. Weinstein, for appellant.
Esther B. Sylvester and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 18, 1971:
